page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN ROSSENDALE
page.content: The most popular{job}in Rossendale is the{footwear}industry.The number of people who are{unemployed}in Rossendale at the moment is precisely one thousand,one hundred and twenty eight.The other popular jobs are working in{shops,cleaning}or in{cafes. The{men}mostly go for the bus driving, engineering,plumbing and joining etc. The{ladies}mostly go for secretarial work,shops,cleaning etc.There are a lot more people not working,than working.The same kind of people come in every day.It depends how many people come into a job centre every day,one day there might be a few people but the next day there might be a lot.The number of people{unemployed is{15.2%.
